messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] storytelling
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 04/12/2003 10:44:51 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Hi Ren -- Have been swamped here, and almost missed this message from you. No, I ve never
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 04/12/2003 10:44:51 AM Central Daylight Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:


> Coming from a storytelling home (my Mom was really into storytelling) I am
> curious if you ever performed in Jonesboro, at the Storytelling festival?
> That was one of the most magical weekends of my life, I hope to return one
> day.
>
> Ren
>

Hi Ren --

Have been swamped here, and almost missed this message from you.

No, I've never performed at Jonesboro, although that is the secret desire of
every storyteller on the planet. :-) As a matter of fact, I hate to admit
that I've never even been to the festival, which is an absolute shame. It is
the Mecca of storytelling, that's for sure. Someday. Someday.

Laura B.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
